**name** | **str** | The name of the new \&quot;The &#x60;_id&#x60; of the resource inventory item you would like to assign. | [optional] 
**description** | **str** | A brief description of the new run group. | [optional] 
**default_group** | **bool** | If &#x60;true&#x60;, makes the new run group the default for the specified activity, in the specified experiment. Only one default group may exist per activity. If another run group is already set as the default, trying to create anther run group as the default will throw an error. | [optional]
